posts.postText:
So the sheep was hanging out in the ocean.
 http://i.minus.com/k8bt6dDqOZXjF.jpg  

Sheep had a friend duck.
 http://i.minus.com/k5DKCyID56NMu.jpg  

They decided that it was too cold.
 http://i.minus.com/kJwAPBdqH1YTN.jpg  

So they went to the desert hottub.
 http://i.minus.com/kbwDq2Vf7TqZjb.jpg  


  THE END.

Dont you remember?
The originals are always better
thank you. i was searching everywhere and couldn't find it.
